title: LinkedIn Rolls Out Its Freelance Marketplace To Compete With Fiverr and Upwork - Slashdot
description: LinkedIn is rolling out a new platform for freelancers to help it better compete against the likes of Fiverr and Upwork. TechCrunch reports:  Today it is taking the wraps off its Service Marketplace, a new feature that will let people advertise themselves for short-term engagements to those looking ...
